Package org.asteroid.util

Class Audio

java.lang.Object
org.asteroid.util.Audio
public class Audio extends Object
It has methods to play wav audio file

  • Constructor Details

    • Audio

      public Audio(String file) throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, IOException, LineUnavailableException
      Creates an instance of Audio class. When you create an instance the audio starts playing
      Parameters:
      file - Audio file address
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException
      IOException
      LineUnavailableException

    • Audio

      public Audio(File file) throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, IOException, LineUnavailableException
      Creates an instance of Audio class. When you create an instance the audio starts playing
      Parameters:
      file - audio file as a instance of File class
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException
      IOException
      LineUnavailableException

      Returns:

      public long getCurrentAudioFrame()

      Returns:

      public long getAudioSize()

      Returns:
      audio size in milliseconds

    • loop

      public void loop(int loop)
      It set value of number of times the audio to be played
      Parameters:
      loop - Number of time to continue the loop

    • setVolume

      public void setVolume(int vol)
      It sets the volume
      Parameters:
      vol - Audio volume in percent

    • getVolume

      public int getVolume()
      It returns the volume
      Returns:
      volume in which the audio is being played in percent

    • printVolume

      public void printVolume()
      It prints the volume

    • waitFor

      public void waitFor()
      It waits for the audio to finish. The control returns back to the calling statement when the audio finishes

    • waitFor

      public void waitFor(int timeout)
      It waits for the audio to finish for a certain period of time. If the audio finish within the given time the control returns bact to the calling statement. If the waiting time reaches the given time limit the control returns back to the calling time.
      Parameters:
      timeout - max time to wait for the audio to finish

    • timeToFinish

      protected int timeToFinish()
      It return the time to finish the audio in milliseconds
      Returns:
      The remaining time to finish the audio in milliseconds

    • getTimeToFinish

      public long getTimeToFinish()
      It return the time to finish the audio in microseconds
      Returns:
      The remaining time to finish the audio in microseconds

    • mute

      public void mute()
      It mutes the audio

      public void unmute()
      It unmutes the audio

      public void toggleMute()
      It toggle the mute mode

    • jumpToPercent

      public void jumpToPercent(double percent) throws IOException, LineUnavailableException, UnsupportedAudioFileException
      It jumps to certain point on the audio according to audio percentage
      Parameters:
      percent - position to jump on in percent
      Throws:
      IOException
      LineUnavailableException
      UnsupportedAudioFileException
